title: Bulletin

succeeded-by.note: Bulletin (Mississippi Geological, Economic, and Topographical  Survey)

additional-notes: Some issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
This is a state publication. Spot-checks of issues did not turn up copyrigght notices, except for a 1962 copyright notice on a reprinted map, for which we did not find a copyright renewal.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
